participant_1.name: Charlie
participant_1.personality: Imaginative and cheerful, often communicates in a playful manner.
participant_1.background: i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Curious and carefree, enjoys exploring and spending time with friends.
participant_2.background: i do not pick up my toys. i've a pet turtle. i'm four. my best friend lives next door.
